ComicInfo.Title: A Very Shuttle Hint!; "A Very Shuttle Hint" Part II: Was This Trip NASA-sary?; Par Time Job!; Buy Low -- Shell High!; This Island ALF!; "She Blinded Me With Science"; This One's on the House!; Luncheons And Flagons The Hard Roll-Playing Game!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Very Shuttle Hint!: ALF stows away in a pet carrier as the Tanners take their family vacation to Florida. While there he stows away on a space shuttle launch.
"A Very Shuttle Hint" Part II: Was This Trip NASA-sary?: ALF poses as the space shuttle's remote control operations system.
Par Time Job!: ALF helps Willie with his golf game.
Buy Low -- Shell High!: ALF shows a video of the time that he and the New Age Melmutant Abstract Turtles teamed to stop Censorhead from stealing works from the Museum of Melmodern Art.
This Island ALF!: After being stung by a jellyfish ALF expands to enormous proportions.
"She Blinded Me With Science": ALF helps Lynn with her biology term paper.
This One's on the House!: ALF and Kate look at a "haunted" house that Kate has been asked to sell.
Luncheons And Flagons The Hard Roll-Playing Game!: This is a one-page Dungeons & Dragons parody.
